question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service-v2/src/service.rs] [Function: DataServiceWrapper::ping()] [Service type confusion] The boolean check at line 156 (ping_live_data_service != is_live_data_service) - can type confusion or integer overflow in boolean operations cause incorrect service type detection?
